message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="What exactly did editor say to you?">
Detailed report requested: What exactly did the editor say to you? Quote or summarize the full content of every message you received from editor. Include timestamps if you have them.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
I received exactly one message from editor. Here is the full content:

**From:** editor
**Summary line:** "Noted amendment, waiting for team-lead assignment"
**Full content (verbatim):**

> "Thanks for flagging the Essay 3 probe wording. I have the amendment noted ("as you moved through the essay's examples" instead of "across the three examples"). However, I'm currently waiting for team-lead to assign me a specific task before I make any edits. I'll incorporate it when the protocol document comes to me."

No timestamps available on my end. This was the only message I have ever received from editor. I replied clarifying that I had not sent any Essay 3 probe wording flag and that editor may have confused me with another teammate.
input.summary: Full verbatim quote of editor's message to me
